5 spots for live music

Music listings for Louisville-area nightclubs

5 spots for live music

Louisville 9:25 a.m. EST December 10, 2014

Drawing of a musical half note(Photo: Getty Images)

CONNECTTWEETLINKEDINCOMMENTEMAILMORE

Mercury Ballroom. 611 S. Fourth St. Friday, Pop Evil, Islander, Red Sun Rising, $15. Saturday, Josh Gracin, J.D. Shelburne, $20.

Stevie Ray's. 230 E. Main St. Thursday, open jam. Friday, Stella Vee's. Saturday, Lamont Gillispie and 100 Proof Blues, The Saints. Tuesdays, blues jam. Dec. 17, Louisville Fats and the Rhythm Cats.

Zanzabar. 2100 S. Preston. Friday, The Whigs, The Hot Wires, $12. Saturday, C2, The Brothers Reed, $6.

Diamond Pub. 630 Barret Ave. Saturday, Manic Focus, Magnetic, $10 advance, $15 day of show. Sunday, Crowbar, Black Crown Initiate, Stonecutters, Luther, Ritual Void, Chigger, $15 advance, $18 day of show.

Gerstle's Place. 3801 Frankfort Ave. Thursday, Me & You. Friday, Melody Resurrection, Strung Out Loud. Saturday, Danny Flanigan, Bari Leigh. Sunday, The Pranksters. Monday, Petar Mandic. Tuesday, Augie & Kaitlin. Dec. 10, Kimmet & Doug.

AROUND TOWN: 5 fun things this week

ON STAGE: 5 productions now playing

CONCERTS: Top shows to check out

TAKE THE KIDS: Top fun things for families

And lots more live music around town

Downtown

Blu Italian Mediterranean Grille. 280 W. Jefferson St. Thursday, Bourbon and Bluegrass; sample signature Kentucky bourbons while listening to Hickory Vaught and Friends. Sunday, 10:30 a.m.-2 p.m., brunch with jazz by The Dave Clark Jazz Trio.

Decca Restaurant and Lounge. 812 E. Market St. Friday, David & Valerie Mayfield. Monday, The Buzzard. Dec. 17, "Radio Presque Rein" with DJ Aaron Rosenblum.

Haymarket Whiskey Bar. 331 E. Market St. Thursday, Spirit Animal, Dream Eye Colour Wheel. Friday, Stone Soul, Bird Zoo, Steasy, Inspireme, The Instrument. Tuesday, Pirate Night with Drunk & Sailor.

Howl at the Moon. 434 S. Fourth St. Saturday, Dueling Piano Band and drink specials.

Jeff Ruby's. 325 W. Main St. Thursday-Saturday, Wednesday, Pete Peterson.

Meta. 425 W. Chestnut St. Friday, DJ.

Mercury Ballroom. 611 S. Fourth St. Friday, Pop Evil, Islander, Red Sun Rising, $15. Saturday, Josh Gracin, J.D. Shelburne, $20.

Nowhere Bar. 1133 Bardstown Road. Thursday, DJ Jay Kay. Friday, Glitter Titz. Saturday, DJ. Tuesday, karaoke.

Stevie Ray's. 230 E. Main St. Thursday, open jam. Friday, Stella Vee's. Saturday, Lamont Gillispie and 100 Proof Blues, The Saints. Tuesdays, blues jam. Dec. 17, Louisville Fats and the Rhythm Cats.

Third Street Dive. 442 S. Third St. Friday, Freddy Flow, Lazy Ass Destroyer, Moxie Motive, $5. Saturday, Sheri Streeter, Motherfolk, Ed Monk, Zach Joseph, $5.

Central

Check's Cafe. 1101 E. Burnett Ave. Thursday and Saturday, karaoke.

Rudyard Kipling. 422 W. Oak. Thursday, Max Garcia Conover.

Zanzabar. 2100 S. Preston. Friday, The Whigs, The Hot Wires, $12. Saturday, C2, The Brothers Reed, $6.

East

Air Devil's Inn. 2802 Taylorsville Road. Monday, karaoke.

Baxter's 942 Bar & Grill. 942 Baxter Ave. Tuesday, Zach Longoria. Wednesday, Full Contact Karaoke.

Diamond Pub. 630 Barret Ave. Saturday, Manic Focus, Magnetic, $10 advance, $15 day of show. Sunday, Crowbar, Black Crown Initiate, Stonecutters, Luther, Ritual Void, Chigger, $15 advance, $18 day of show.

Drakes. 3939 Shelbyville Road. Thursday-Saturday, DJ.

Gerstle's Place. 3801 Frankfort Ave. Thursday, Me & You. Friday, Melody Resurrection, Strung Out Loud. Saturday, Danny Flanigan, Bari Leigh. Sunday, The Pranksters. Monday, Petar Mandic. Tuesday, Augie & Kaitlin. Dec. 10, Kimmet & Doug.

Headliners Music Hall. 1836 Lexington Road. Thursday, Sweaty Sheep Merry Christmas Gala with Street Corners Symphony, Frank Morris, Bernie Lubbers, $15. Saturday, White Reaper, Tweens, Old Baby, $5. Sunday, Todd Snider, Dave Schools, Neal Casal, Duane Trucks, Chad Staehly, Jesse Aycock, Turbo Fruits, $25. headlinerslouisville.com.

Hideaway Saloon. 1607 Bardstown Road. Thursday, The Harrison Anvil Band. Friday, Whiskey Reverb. Saturday, Blues & Greys. Dec. 17, Tom Boone and the Front Porch Pickers.

Highland Taproom. 1058 Bardstown Road. Friday-Sunday, karaoke.

Jack Fry's. 1007 Bardstown Road. Thursday, Ray Johnson. Friday, Saturday and Monday, Steve Crews. Tuesday and Wednesday, Ray Johnson, Jenna Mattingly, Dave Wilson.

Jerry Green & Friends. 2800 Breckenridge Lane. Wednesday and Thursday, 9 p.m.-1 a.m.; Friday and Saturday, 9 p.m.-3 a.m., Jerry Green & Friends Band (pop/Motown). Wednesday and Friday, 7-9 p.m., Freddy George. Sunday-Tuesday, karaoke.

Jim Porter's. 2345 Lexington Road. Friday, Chris Leigh & The Broken Hearts. Friday and Saturday, Rhythm Machine, Dogville, Jimmy & the Slammers. Tuesday, Bop Night. Dec. 17, Mixed Bag Wednesday.

Majid's. 3930 Chenoweth Square. Thursday, Tanita Gaines. Friday and Saturday, Bobby J and Michael Roy. Tuesday, Barb & Eddie.

Molly Malone's. 3900 Shelbyville Road. Thursday, Petar Mandic. Friday and Saturday, DJ.

O'Shea's. 956 Baxter Ave. Friday and Saturday, DJ.

Phoenix Hill Tavern. 644 Baxter Ave. Friday, Last of 2014 Showcase with Jayson William Allen, Stolen Remains, Hurt Circle, Bury The Wicked, Scarecrow. Saturday, Redline, Naked Garden, Str8 Jakkit. Dec. 17, The Hiding, Clint Ayres.

Wick's. 975 Baxter Ave. Friday, Magnolia Sons. Saturday, 8 Inch Elvis.

Wick's. 2927 Goose Creek Road. Friday, Gary Sanders Band. Saturday, Battle of the Bands.

Wick's. 12717 Shelbyville Road. Friday, karaoke with host Lisa. Dec. 17, family karaoke.

South

BJ's. 8238 Dixie Highway. Saturday, DJ Rip.

JT's Variety Club. 8021 Preston Highway. Thursday, Friday, karaoke with host Chris. Saturday, DJ Bruce with Steve. Friday, Junior Brown. Friday and Saturday, Spare Change, Copperfield, Str8 Jakkit. Tuesday, Bop Night. Oct. 1, DJ Crim's Line Dance Party.

Joe's Older Than Dirt. 8131 New La Grange Road. Thursday and Tuesday, karaoke. Friday-Saturday, DJ.

West

Cole's Place. 2928 W. Kentucky St. Friday-Saturday, DJ.

Joe's Palm Room. 1821 W. Jefferson St. Thursday-Friday, Frankie and Ralph Adams, DJ Wynn. Thursday, karaoke with host Marcus.

Legends. 2523 W. Broadway. Friday and Saturday, DJ.

Indiana

Wick's. 225 State St., New Albany. Thursday, open mic. Friday, J.D. Shelbourne. Saturday, The Sell Outs.
